title: A physical wiring diagram for the human immune system
Tell HN: Pinebook Pro is a $219 brick
text: Just got my Pinebook Pro, installed the default Manjaro Plasma (you can't get that wrong), after reboot, I was asked to apply updates. I did and after a reboot the machine is completely bricked. Many people on Reddit share the same experience! I wish I've search Reddit before throwing $260 down the drain!
